Nasal congestion

Steam inhalation (such as

If severe, occasional doses of

spray.
Phenylephrine or pseudoephedrine, 
especially	in	the	first	three	months	of	
pregnancy.
Pain (for example 
headache, 
toothache)
Paracetamol. Ibuprofen and medicines that contain 
codeine (for example co-codamol, co-
dydramol, pholcodine and dihydrocodeine), 
unless advised by your doctor.
Threadworms P
